Title: Dropped books
Option One:
Update from you: Well I was late to a class today,\n
but I was able to help someone out! My good deed \n
for the day is done!
Option 2:
Update from you: Is it wrong to just shove \n
someone's books off to the side in the hallway \n
rather than help them pick them up?
Option 3:
Update from you: Lol. Some people are so clumsy. \n
We are in college and people are still dropping \n
their books.

Title: Dropped wallet
Option One:
Update on MyPage: Well someone found my wallet, \n
but that someone also helped themselves to dinner. \n
I guess I should be grateful they took it to lost \n
and found at least. Still. I needed that money.
Option 2:
It is good to know that there are good people out \n
there. Someone turned in my wallet, and luckily \n
everything is still in there. That could have been \n
a lot worse!
Option 3:
Update on MyPage: I made a new friend today! this \n
random person manages to track me down with my \n
wallet that I misplaced. We became fast friends \n
over dinner, my treat of course!

Title: Lost Student
Option One:
Update from you: Its a small world after all...
I tried to tell this one student I can't help \n
them find their class because I was running late. \n
turns out, we were going to the same class.
Option 2:
Update from you: Well I had an awkward expereince. \n
This international student was trying to ask me for \n
directions, but I ran off cause I had class. Well \n
guess who has the same class as meâ€¦
Option 3:
Update from you: When someone asks for your help \n
finding their class and you are both going to the \n
same place. I made a new friend!

Title: Withdrawn friend
Option One:
Update from you: Well one of my friends is in the \n
hospital for a suicide attempt. I wish I would have \n
done more to help them.
Option 2:
Update on MyPage: Really glad to have good friends. \n
I cannot explain how great it is to have someone \n
who has your back.
Option 3:
Update on MyPage: When you want to be happy, your \n
friends try and help you be happy, and it still \n
isn't enough to be happy.

Title: declined card
Option One:
Update on MyPage: I love people. My card got \n
declined today because my bank decided that my card \n
wasn't good enough, and someone else payed for my \n
meal. Thank you stranger!
Option 2:
Update from you: Well I guess some college kids \n
actually do starve. One guy today couldn't pay for \n
his food... sucks to be him I guess but I still \n
feel bad.
Option 3:
Update on MyPage: What is wrong with some people? \n
My card gets declined and the guy behind me starts \n
trying to get others to pay for my meal. Like that \n
just seems rude to me!

Title: dropped flyer
Option One:
Update: Picked up a flyer that someone dropped \n
today. Its the little things in life that make ua \n
feel good.
Option 2:
Update from you: I got to help hang posters for an \n
event today. It seems like a really fun one, and \n
the person I was helping seemed to appreciate the \n
help.
Option 3:
Update from you: Saw someone struggling with some \n
posters for the event today. It seems like a fun \n
thing to go to.

Title: Struggling to carry things
Option One:
Update on MyPage: When you are struggling to carry \n
things, and someone helps you out. Thank you person!
Option 2:
Update on MyPage: Someone helped me out today! I \n
appreciate making new friends!
Option 3:
Update from you: Well, I could have helped someone\n
out today. I didn't, and they dropped all of their \n
things everwhere.
